# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = split(text, " ")
    wrapped_lines = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in lines
        if length(current_line) + length(word) <= text_width
            current_line *= " " * word
        else
            push!(wrapped_lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
    end
    return wrapped_lines
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello world this is a very long sentence that needs to be wrapped into multiple lines.", 20)
3-element Array{String,1}:
 "Hello world this is"
 "a very long sentence"
 "that needs to be wrapped into multiple lines."
```
